'''Tetreaux''' is an open-world [[NPC]] located in [[Court of Fontaine: Fleuve Cendre]], [[Fontaine]]. He is the bartender at L'or noir, a [[Spina di Rosula]]-owned bar.

==Dialogue==
{{Dialogue Start}}
:'''Tetreaux:''' Got a problem? I can solve it for you.
:{{DIcon}} Can you solve any problem?
::'''Tetreaux:''' Theoretically, I do not believe there is any problem that can only be solved by force.
::'''Tetreaux:''' When we of the Spina di Rosula act, I'm certain that we'll be able to resolve your issue with minimal harm.
::'''Tetreaux:''' From things as small as living supplies and household affairs, to matters as large as factional disputes and savings... the Spina will do all it can for you.
:{{DIcon}} Sorry for bothering you.
::'''Tetreaux:''' Consider it no bother &mdash; we all help each other here.
{{Dialogue End}}
